EntityDatabase.cs

00001 using myMD.Model.DataModel;
00002 using myMD.Model.FileHelper;
00003 using myMD.ModelInterface.DataModelInterface;
00004 using SQLite;
00005 using SQLiteNetExtensions.Extensions;
00006 using System.Collections.Generic;
00007 using System.Linq;
00008 using Xamarin.Forms;
00009 
00010 namespace myMD.Model.DatabaseModel
00011 {
00016         public class EntityDatabase : IEntityDatabase
00017     {
00022         public EntityDatabase() : this(DependencyService.Get<IFileHelper>()) { }
00023 
00028         public EntityDatabase(IFileHelper helper)
00029         {
00030             db = new SQLiteConnection(helper.GetLocalFilePath(FILE));
00031             Create();
00032             profile = db.Find<Profile>(v => true);
00033         }
00034 
00039         private static readonly string FILE = "database.db3";
00040 
00045         private SQLiteConnection db;
00046 
00050         private Profile profile;
00051 
00053         public void Update(IEntity entity) => db.UpdateWithChildren(entity.ToEntity());
00054 
00056         public void Delete(IEntity entity)
00057         {
00058             Entity e = entity.ToEntity();
00059             e.Delete();
00060             db.Delete(e);
00061         }
00062 
00064         public void Insert(IEntity entity)
00065         {
00066             Entity e = entity.ToEntity();
00067             e.Profile = profile;
00068             db.Insert(e);
00069         }
00070 
00076         public IList<E> GetAllDataFromProfile<E>() where E : Entity, new()
00077         {
00078             return db.GetAllWithChildren<E>(e => e.ProfileID == profile.ID, true);
00079         }
00080 
00082         public IList<IDoctorsLetter> GetAllDoctorsLetters()
00083         {
00084             return GetAllDataFromProfile<DoctorsLetter>().Cast<IDoctorsLetter>().ToList();
00085         }
00086 
00088         public IList<IDoctorsLetterGroup> GetAllDoctorsLetterGroups()
00089         {
00090             return GetAllDataFromProfile<DoctorsLetterGroup>().Cast<IDoctorsLetterGroup>().ToList();
00091         }
00092 
00094         public IList<IMedication> GetAllMedications()
00095         {
00096             return GetAllDataFromProfile<Medication>().Cast<IMedication>().ToList();
00097         }
00098 
00100         public IList<IProfile> GetAllProfiles()
00101         {
00102             return db.GetAllWithChildren<Profile>().Cast<IProfile>().ToList();
00103         }
00104 
00106         public void Activate(IProfile profile) => this.profile = profile.ToProfile();
00107 
00111         public void Destroy()
00112         {
00113             db.DropTable<DoctorsLetter>();
00114             db.DropTable<DoctorsLetterGroup>();
00115             db.DropTable<DoctorsLetterGroupDoctorsLetter>();
00116             db.DropTable<Medication>();
00117             db.DropTable<Profile>();
00118             db.DropTable<Doctor>();
00119         }
00120 
00124         public void Create()
00125         {
00126             db.CreateTable<DoctorsLetter>();
00127             db.CreateTable<DoctorsLetterGroup>();
00128             db.CreateTable<DoctorsLetterGroupDoctorsLetter>();
00129             db.CreateTable<Medication>();
00130             db.CreateTable<Profile>();
00131             db.CreateTable<Doctor>();
00132         }
00133 
00138         public IProfile GetProfile(IProfile profile) => db.Get<Profile>(v => v.InsuranceNumber.Equals(profile.InsuranceNumber));
00139 
00144         public IDoctor GetDoctor(IDoctor doctor) => db.Get<Doctor>(v => v.Name.Equals(doctor.Name));
00145     }
00146 }
